content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"What are standards?\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"International Standards make things work. They give world-class specifications for products, services and systems to ensure quality, safety and efficiency. They are instrumental in facilitating international trade.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM has established and manages its business processes as a unified system and integrating ISO 9001:2015, ISO/IEC 27001:2013, ISO/IEC 27701:2019, ISAE 3402, statutory and regulatory requirements while implementing state-of-the-art technology.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"QMS is maintained with respect to applicable requirements of CMMI, ISO 13485:2016, EN ISO 14971:2019, IEC 62304:2006/AMD1:2015, ISO 14001:2015, PCI-DSS to satisfy specific contract requirements.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Following is a summary of these standards.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"ISO 9001\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"ISO is an independent, non-governmental international organization which brings together experts to share knowledge and develop voluntary, consensus-based, market relevant International Standards that support innovation and provide solutions to global challenges. One of its most powerful products is ISO series 9000.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/d995ff9c-1f2e-4573-afd8-06c78af180ab/ISO_logo.png\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":173,\"height\":69}},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The ISO 9000 family addresses various aspects of quality management. These standards provide guidance and tools for companies and organizations who want to ensure that their products and services consistently meet customer's requirements, and that quality is consistently improved. The central standard is ISO 9001.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"ISO 9001 sets out the criteria for a quality management system. This standard is based on a number of quality management principles including a strong customer focus, the motivation and implication of top management, the process approach and continual improvement.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"ISO 9001 does not dictate which exact processes a company shall employ and how they shall interact, it simply defines the general principles of their implementation and monitoring. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM offices stay in line with ISO 9001, this is confirmed by the relevant certificates, see \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://epam.sharepoint.com/sites/policy/index.aspx/Policy/Parent%2520Pages/Certificates/EPAM%2520Certificates.aspx?Standard%255Btype%255D=subarea&Standard%255BfilterInvolve%255D=include_any&Standard%255Bitems%255D%255B0%255D=ISO%25209001\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"ISO 9001 Certified EPAM locations\\r.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"ISO/IEC 27001\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"ISO/IEC 27001\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" is an information security standard, part of the ISO/IEC 27000 family of standards.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"ISO/IEC 27001\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" defines requirements for Information Security Management System. EPAM successfully implemented these requirements, this is confirmed by the relevant certificates: see\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://epam.sharepoint.com/sites/policy/index.aspx/Policy/Parent%2520Pages/Certificates/EPAM%2520Certificates.aspx?Standard%255Btype%255D=subarea&Standard%255BfilterInvolve%255D=include_any&Standard%255Bitems%255D%255B0%255D=ISO%252027001\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" ISO 27001 Certified EPAM offices\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Other standards in the ISO/IEC 27000 family of standards provide additional guidance on certain aspects of designing, implementing and operating an ISMS, for example on information security risk management (ISO/IEC 27005).\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"ISAE 3402\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"International Standard on Assurance Engagements 3402 (ISAE 3402)\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\", titled Assurance Reports on Controls at a Service Organization, is an international assurance standard that prescribes Service Organization Control (SOC) reports, which gives assurance to organization's customers and service users that the service organization has adequate internal controls.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"ISAE 3402 \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"(International Standard on Assurance Engagements) audit takes place annually, and results of this audit are reflected in reports. See more  -  \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://epam.sharepoint.com/sites/policy/index.aspx/Policy/Parent%2520Pages/Certificates/EPAM%2520Certificates.aspx?Standard%255Btype%255D=subarea&Standard%255BfilterInvolve%255D=include_any&Standard%255Bitems%255D%255B0%255D=ISAE%25203402&CertificationBody%255Btype%255D=subarea&CertificationBody%255BfilterInvolve%255D=include_any&CertificationBody%255Bitems%255D%255B0%255D=Deloitte%2520Ltd.\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"ISAE 3402 reports. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
